title: Philadelphia Meetup This Sunday
summary:
Key ideas:
-Scott will be in Philadelphia as part of the Meetups Everywhere tour
-The meetup will take place at Tir Na Nog Bar & Grill, 1600 Arch Street
-People who want to attend the meetup are welcome, regardless of whether they are "the typical SSC reader" or feel awkward about attending
-The restaurant is inside the Phoenix Hotel, directly above Suburban Station, with the entire outer vestibule area reserved for the meetup

Key learnings:
-Scott is actively engaged in organizing and participating in meetups as part of the Meetups Everywhere tour
-Tir Na Nog Bar & Grill is hosting the Philadelphia meetup in a reserved area
-Scott welcomes all readers to attend the meetup, regardless of any reservations or worries they may have

Key questions:
-No key questions are present in this portion of the blog post.
